column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Ba-ba-reeba was once my go-to for special occasions.  Thankfully
column2: since Yelp entered my restaurant-sheltered life
column3: I realize there are many more NEW places perfect for birthdays
column4: girls' nights out and let's get tipsy Tuesdays!  In a way
column5: I have outgrown my Ba-Ba-Reeba days.  However
column6: I will never turn down one of their a bacon-wrapped dates.  Just the thought makes me salivate.
